net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.util
Class DbUnitUtils

java.lang.Object
  net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.util.DbUnitUtils

public final class DbUnitUtils
extends Object

Various utility methods for working with data sets etc.

Author:
jakub.holy@ibacz.eu

Method Detail

describe

public static String describe(org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet dataSet)
Create a log String with info about the data set including table names and their row counts.

Parameters:
dataSet - (optional) - returns "null" if null

describeWithDuplicates

public static String describeWithDuplicates(org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet dataSet,
                                            org.dbunit.database.IDatabaseConnection connection)
Create a log String with info about the data set including table names, their row counts and rows with a duplicate primary key.

Parameters:
dataSet - (optional) - returns "null" if null
connection - (optional) - necessary to fetch primary key info

findPkDuplicates

protected static Set findPkDuplicates(org.dbunit.dataset.ITable table,
                                      org.dbunit.database.IDatabaseConnection connection)
                               throws org.dbunit.dataset.DataSetException
Find all (single or composed) primary keys that are duplicated in the table and can thus lead to an integrity violation exception.

Parameters:
table - (required)
connection - (required)
Returns:
Set<String> of primary keys that appear more than once in the table; composed primary keys are separated by '|'. Returns an empty set if no duplicates.
Throws:
org.dbunit.dataset.DataSetException

getPrimaryKeys

public static org.dbunit.dataset.Column[] getPrimaryKeys(org.dbunit.database.IDatabaseConnection connection,
                                                         String tableName)
                                                  throws org.dbunit.dataset.DataSetException,
                                                         SQLException
Returns the actual primary keys for a table.

Parameters:
databaseConnection - (required)
tableName - (required) The table name; if using fully-qualified names it must be fully qualified ("schema.table")
Returns:
the table's primary keys or an empty array, if none defined
Throws:
SQLException - See IDatabaseConnection.createDataSet()
org.dbunit.dataset.DataSetException - See IDataSet.getTableMetaData(String) and ITableMetaData.getPrimaryKeys()
